QuestData.Title: Circle the Wagons... er, Boats
QuestData.Description: The fires are dealt with, but there are still Southsea pirates getting ready to board the Speedbarge.$B$BTime to switch to the other side cannon and sink them before it's too late!
QuestData.RewardText: You did it! You did it!$B$B<Jinky grabs you and gives you a big smooch on the cheek! She then regains her dignity and smooths her clothes.>$B$BThanks for saving my Speedbarge, Captain $n.
